positions.subtitle: NICE Ltd
positions.description: Part of NICE's delivery team Advanced Services for custom solutions on top of standard NICE products. Primary projects on Data & audio Migration, Cloud Migration,  Decommissioning. Designed a Local time sync functionality using MS SQL to be incorporated for systems spread across various time zones. Designed a search bot utility using Python and Langchain library to improve internal support operations.Skills : SQL, AWS (S3, EC2, Snowball, Direct S3, CLI), Python, Requirement gathering, Solution Design, Effort estimation
positions.title: Advanced services Engineer
positions.description_html:
Part of NICE's delivery team Advanced Services for custom solutions on top of standard NICE products.

Primary projects on Data & audio Migration, Cloud Migration, Decommissioning.

Designed a Local time sync functionality using MS SQL to be incorporated for systems spread across various time zones. Designed a search bot utility using Python and Langchain library to improve internal support operations.

Skills : SQL, AWS (S3, EC2, Snowball, Direct S3, CLI), Python, Requirement gathering, Solution Design, Effort estimation

positions.subtitle: NICE Ltd
positions.description: 1. Part of team providing technical services for Enterprise & Compliance recording solution NICE Engage, serving a global client base along with Internal teams. 2. Exceeded KPIs of RCA, Technical analysis & consultations. 3. Over the tenure, acted as a Technical lead- drove Technical escalations, helped in Recruitment operations and Mentored 6 engineers. Helped deliver 20+ KT sessions. 4. Spot award recognizing Fast Technical growth and help in upskilling new hires.
positions.title: Engineer - Client services
positions.description_html:
1. Part of team providing technical services for Enterprise & Compliance recording solution NICE Engage, serving a global client base along with Internal teams.
2. Exceeded KPIs of RCA, Technical analysis & consultations.
3. Over the tenure, acted as a Technical lead- drove Technical escalations, helped in Recruitment operations and Mentored 6 engineers. Helped deliver 20+ KT sessions.
4. Spot award recognizing Fast Technical growth and help in upskilling new hires.
